description: Job that deletes Terasort files from Kerberized HDFS

run.cmd: /bin/bash && cd $MESOS_SANDBOX && python3 dcos-cli-auth.py --username=$DCOS_UID --password=$DCOS_PASSWORD && dcos task exec hdfsclient kinit -k -t hdfs.keytab {principal} && dcos task exec hdfsclient bin/hdfs dfs -rm -r -f /terasort_in /terasort_out
